Send password reset email

Source: R/frbs_send_password_reset_email.R
frbs_send_password_reset_email.Rd

Send password reset email

Usage

frbs_send_password_reset_email(email)

Arguments

email

User's email address.

Value

A named list with the following items:

  • email: Users' email address.

  • error:

    • NULL if no error code in response

    • A list of 2 if response was an error:

      • code: Error code

      • message: Error message

Details

Visit Firebase Auth REST API docs for more details

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
frbs_send_password_reset_email("user-email-goes-here")
} # }
